title: Lando Norris stood tall at Silverstone but Oscar Piastri came back fighting at Spa
summary: The 2025 British Grand Prix would be the last race in which Red Bull Racing was led by Christian Horner, his departure from the team announced three days later. Theâ€¦

qa_pairs.question: Who was the team principal of Red Bull Racing until the 2025 British Grand Prix?
Which two drivers are mentioned in connection with the races at Silverstone and Spa?
What significant event happened shortly after the 2025 British Grand Prix?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Christian Horner announced his departure from Red Bull Racing
wrong_options: Red Bull Racing won the Constructors' Championship
Lando Norris won his first race
